name: The Last Tree (itch) (Robin Six, Bastard "Keromas" Gabin, Celulo)
name_original: The Last Tree (itch) (Robin Six, Bastard "Keromas" Gabin, Celulo)
description:
The very last hope of the magical world is under siege! Creatures from the depths want to destroy it at any cost. With your companions, gather weapons and protect the last remaining essence of magic in this world, a magnicifent giant tree.
In this fast-paced first person action game, cooperate with other players to eradicate the threat using the weapons around you. Watch your back, slash, and survive.

The game has been made during the 2023 Global Game Jam!



CONTROLS
WASD / ZQSD - Move
Mouse movement - Camera
Left Shift - Dash
Left Click - Attack

You have to launch Steam to play the game!

You can adjust the mouse sensitivity at your convenience in the settings, or in the in game pause menu that you can open using the escape key.

The game has no audio.
